question: You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you haven't handed in the project yetrequest more time to do it.
text: I'm writing this letter in connection with the project which had to be submitted last week.
I'm Akila from the second-year class of the business management course on the College drive campus. My student ID is A00098 and my admission number is 129762.

I was not able to handle  my research finding on marketing advancements in the CUSMA agreement which was due, as I was severely affected by Covid-19 . I was hospitalized and stayed in quarantine for almost 5 days . As most of my work was in my room, I was not able to input all the information on time.

It could be of  great help if you can provide me with some more additional time to complete my project as I still have not completely recovered from the illness. Furthermore, an extension of a week will help me to complete my project without any hassles.
Looking  forward to hearing from you.
